(NE S orr## Gr Date of Issue 12 SeIf 1336 Ronald Adam's newest venture is tc take over the Phoenix Theatre, follow¬ ing Noel Coward’s successful season there. It may be remembered that Mr. Adam occupied the Phoenix for over a year with“ Ten Minute Alibi.“ season there He now contemp with the-transrer of Prefessor Bern¬
hardi.“ which has been so successful at the Embassy. It will open on Tuesday, July 14. This play has aroused more contro¬ versy at the Embassy Theatre than any since" The Dominant Sex,“ which has just concluded a triumphant run of 20 months in London.
EXTRAETIRRON GA
7636 8 42- Mr. Ronald Adam is bringing one of his most successful Embassy productions, Schnitzler's“ Professor Bernhardi,“ to the Phoenix Theatre, opening this Tues¬ day night. There are a few changes in the cast (which, incidentally, consists of eighteen men #ith onlv one subsidiary female character) and Mr. Abraham seiner will continue to play the entet part.
